title: Pearl of the South Pacific 1955 | Virginia Mayo, Dennis Morgan | Full Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Pearl of the South Pacific 1955 | Virginia Mayo, Dennis Morgan | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
'What's one more sin when there's a fortune to share?'
'Love? I've had it! now what I'm after is pearls!'...pearls as black as their hearts...black as her past!
Two beachcombers with a yacht join woman-with-a-past Rita on a quest for black pearls on a secret island. Arrived, they find another white man has made himself high priest; but George, the latterâ€™s handsome son, is fair game for Rita, who lands in the guise of a missionary! The inevitable conflict over the pearls brings violence and corruption to the quiet island.

Original title: Pearl of the South Pacific (1955)

Director: Allan Dwan
Writers: Jesse Lasky Jr., Talbot Jennings, Anna Hunger
Stars: Virginia Mayo, Dennis Morgan, David Farrar
Genres: Action, Adventure
